description:
Flea Market
Bunji and Fumi are learning how to sell at the flea market.  
Bunji displays his lack of talent in math and Fumi shows her mom how to work over a customer. 
Dancing Mom
Mom has finally sold a doll she considered cursed, but the doll will have the last laugh.
Mom`s Counterattack
Mom can`t understand Bunji`s reading homework, suddenly the spirit of early education is back and he and mom are locked in a battle of trivia. 
Dad`s Day Off.
Today Dad is trying to relaxing, but it seems the world is plotting against him. Will he be able to get any rest?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Flea Market / Dancing Mom / Mom`s Counterattack / Dad`s Day Off
フリマ / フリフリママ / かあさんの逆襲 / とうさんの休日
